name: À la Fenêtre
description:
A girl and a boy remenbering how life was before the world longest lockdown. 
The Jam version is probably broken in a lot of place, sorry!

Play with arrow keys, that's it.

POST JAM UPDATE : better collisions and a new control scheme

Art : Garance Royere
Code, design and story : Géraud Zucchini
Music : Antoine Druaux

Thanks to Laura Fournier and Florent de Grissac for the english proof reading
